name: tvplus-contentslide
description: This extension allows you to inherit the content of a TemplaVoilaPlus content element column to its child pages - Adaption of EXT:kb_tv_cont_slide to work with templavoilaplus
author: j.peter.m.schuler@uni-due.de

scripts.develop: trap 'npm run  version:revert' SIGINT; npm run watch
scripts.develop:all: npm run test && npm run version:prerelease && ./.deploy.sh
scripts.release: npm run version:patch; git commit -a -m "[RELEASE] Releasing v$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version")"; git tag v$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version")  -m "[RELEASE] Releasing v$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version")";  git archive -o "tvplus_contentslide_$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version").zip" v$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version"); npm run version:prerelease; git commit -a -m "[TASK] set version to v$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:copy: npm run version:copy:package.json:ext_emconf.php && npm run version:copy:package.json:composer.json
scripts.version:revert: npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease --preid=reset; npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease --preid=alpha; npm run version:copy
